Home > Restaurants > RIME Oyster Bar

RIME Oyster Bar

Seafood/Raw Bar $$$ Deer Valley

World's only slopeside raw bar located in refurbished cabin at top of Deer Valley's Jordanelle Gondola. Prime time is 2-3pm for $2.50 oyster happy hour.

Must-Try Dishes

  • Oysters on half-shell ($2.50 during happy hour)
  • Lobster rolls
  • Chowder
  • Champagne pairings

Features & Amenities

Worlds Only Slopeside Raw Bar Gondola Top Location Refurbished Cabin Oyster Happy Hour Mountain Setting Limited Seating

Perfect For

Apres Ski Special Occasion Unique Experience

Restaurant Information

Hours

Oyster Happy Hour: 2-3pm daily

Contact

Top of Deer Valley's Jordanelle Gondola, Deer Valley Resort

Visit Website
Last updated: 2025-07-05
